sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; export default function Tweet({ imgSource, imgAlt, tweetText, username, profileName, date, isVerified, }) { const [shares, setShares] = useState(0); const [likes, setLikes] = useState(0); const [replies, setReplies] = useState(0); // Function to increment the replies count const handleReplyClick = () => setReplies((prevReplies) => prevReplies + 1); // Function to increment the shares count const handleShareClick = () => setShares((prevShares) => prevShares + 1); // Function to increment the likes count const handleLikeClick = () => setLikes((prevLikes) => prevLikes + 1); return (

{profileName}

{isVerified && ( )}

{username}

· {date}

{tweetText}

{replies}
{shares}
{likes}
); }
